name: Medicare Hospital Insurance
objective: To provide hospital insurance protection for covered services to persons age 65 or above, to certain disabled persons and to individuals with chronic renal disease.
top_agency_name: Department of Health and Human Services
sub_agency_name: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
beneficiary_types: Physically Afflicted (e.g. TB, Arthritis, Heart Disease)
applicant_types: Specialized group (e.g. health professionals, students, veterans)

authorizations.text: American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009, Public Law 111-5, Title XVIII of the Social Security Act, Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act (Public Law 111-152).

rules_regulations: Code of Federal Regulations, Title 20, Parts 401, 405 and 422; Title 42, Parts 400, 401, 405, 406, 409, 412, 417, and 418. " Medicare and You," SSA-79-10050, and other publications are available from any Social Security Office without charge.
